title: FREE SKIN GLITCH IN DRAFT! PATCH
body: Me and my friend were playing draft when he wanted braum so i grabbed it. He then picked trist cause we were going to trade, so he equipped the riot trist skin for no reason and then when we traded he had dragonslayer braum ingame he doesnt even own braum. When u equip a skin on a champ then trade u get the skin slot on that champ.
